channel.title: Game crashed, unable to load autosave :(
channel.description:
I was playing Black Mesa on the last chapter (14) when the game suddenly freezed. Now I'm unable to load autosave files. I was on the last chapter so it makes me feel kind of sad really. The loading screen comes up but the game hangs at the last "loading dot". I've reinstalled the game once so don't suggest that :slight_smile:
Anyone got any suggestion or possible fixes?
